nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.tests.render

Class FocusAreaTests

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.tests.render.FocusAreaTests

  • public class FocusAreaTests
extends java.lang.Object
    Some minor tests checking that the 'focus area' functionality of the Renderer works. The MazeStates used in these tests are versions of code purloined from straigfene that I have modified to be suitable here.
     

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FocusAreaTests() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MazeState makeEdgeMazeState()
      Construct a MazeState designed to test edge cases.
      MazeState makeLargeMazeState()
      Construct a large MazeState - large enough for the focus area to shift around with the player.
      MazeState makeSmallMazeState()
      Construct a smallish MazeState.
      void test_customFocusArea()
      Tests that custom focus areas are preserved, and disposed of when intended.
      void test_focusArea()
      Tests that the focus area is stored correctly.
      void test_focusAreaEdgeObscuration()
      Tests that the focus area displays and obscures objects correctly in edge cases.
      void test_focusAreaMetrics_large()
      Tests that focus area and cell sizing is calculated correctly for large mazes, even when Chap moves.
      void test_focusAreaMetrics_small()
      Tests that focus area and cell sizing is calculated correctly for small mazes, even when Chap moves.
      void test_focusAreaObscuration()
      Tests that the focus area displays and obscures objects correctly.
